member.name: T:Libx.Fix.AutoCameraTarget.Camera
member.summary:
Provides utility functions to manipulate the camera in view.
Before each use, this class must be initialized with the 'Init' function and the initial camera **MUST** be aligned with the horizon (i.e. the `RhinoViewport.CameraX.Z == 0`). the calculation of transformations is optimized in a single pass in and corresponds to the transformations:
Scale (camera-target * Zoom) * Translation (Pos[X|Y|Z]) // Pos[X|Y|Z] is the target point. * Rotation (RotZ, ZAxis) * Rotation (RotX, XAxis) * Translation (Pan[X|Y|Z])

member.name: F:Libx.Fix.AutoCameraTarget.Camera.PanX
member.summary: Offset along camera X axis.

member.name: F:Libx.Fix.AutoCameraTarget.Camera.PanY
member.summary: Offset along camera Y (Up) axis

member.name: F:Libx.Fix.AutoCameraTarget.Camera.PanZ
member.summary: Offset along camera Z (Direction) axis

member.name: F:Libx.Fix.AutoCameraTarget.Camera.RotX
member.summary: Rotation of the camera around the X axis. This rotation is performed before the Z rotation.

member.name: F:Libx.Fix.AutoCameraTarget.Camera.RotZ
member.summary: Rotation of the camera around the Z axis. This rotation is performed after the X rotation.

member.name: F:Libx.Fix.AutoCameraTarget.Camera.PosX
member.summary: Global X position of all transformations

member.name: F:Libx.Fix.AutoCameraTarget.Camera.PosY
member.summary: Global Y position of all transformations

member.name: F:Libx.Fix.AutoCameraTarget.Camera.PosZ
member.summary: Global Z position of all transformations

member.name: M:Libx.Fix.AutoCameraTarget.Camera.Init(Rhino.Display.RhinoViewport,Rhino.Geometry.Point3d)
member.summary: Initialize the class before using it
member.param: The target point of the camera.
